section.title: ITE, client API and remote control extension examples
section.para: Each installation contains source code examples for extending the supported toolkits. The examples can be found as source- and binary-features in the local p2-repository development/org.eclipse.jubula.repo.zip, and are out-of-the-box ready to be installed into the ITE.

listitem.para: Jubula Example - Toolkit Extension - JavaFX: PieChart
Jubula Example - Toolkit Extension - Swing: JSlider

section.para: Each toolkit extension consists of four individual modules:
section.programlisting: org.eclipse.jubula.examples.extension.<toolkitName>.api : holds the custom client API information org.eclipse.jubula.examples.extension.<toolkitName>.api.test : holds an example JUnit based client API test for the AUT org.eclipse.jubula.examples.extension.<toolkitName>.rc : holds the remote control implementation org.eclipse.jubula.examples.extension.<toolkitName>.toolkit : holds the declarative toolkit description for the ITE
section.para: The individual AUTs showing the capability of these extensions are located in "examples/development/extension/AUT".
